name: You Slept In...
description:
*So far this game is in very very new born child phase, a prototype if you will. And almost everything in the demo is subject to change* 

The world around you is destroyed, your family and friends are all gone. What do you do?

This is one of my first ever unity projects, so please don't judge my bad level design and menu.

This is a liner story type game, like half life, you have to complete things and walk around mostly in a straight fashion.
